tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Musical_Instruments (
    instrument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    brand VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE instruments(
  instrument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  brand VARCHAR(255),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment(
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE instruments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(100),
    brand VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_id INT,
    department_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (instrument_id) REFERENCES instruments (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (department_id) REFERENCES departments (id)
);
CREATE TABLE instruments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(50), price DECIMAL(10,2), quantity INT)
CREATE TABLE brands (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), country VARCHAR(100), year_founded INT)
CREATE TABLE categories (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE suppliers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(150), contact_person VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(20), email VARCHAR(100)

CREATE TABLE inventory (id INT PRIMARY KEY, instrument_id INT, supplier_id INT, quantity INT, FOREIGN KEY (instrument_id) REFERENCES instruments(id), FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(id))
